trans-unit.source: Enables you to pass context properties from the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) into the COM+ context.
COMTI provides services for accessing the IBM Customer Information Control System (CICS) and IBM Information Management System (IMS).
Essentially, COMTI provides a set of tools and services that ease the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, enabling the setting of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) context properties are passed into the COM+ context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
